reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and well-made, appreciating its nice color and casual style.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect knitted cardigan
items.body: Soft comfortable and warm. True to size. Not super thick material and light weight. Perfect for fall or spring. Even to just wear around the office. Cute and worth the money spent. Read more
items.author: Andrynne Nelson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful and Functional
items.body: This sweater is comfortable and good quality. Bought it to be oversized and baggy, bought my normal size and it works for me. My one complaint is the color. Purchased the orange thinking it looked more burnt orange, definitely Halloween Orange. Still pretty, just brighter than expected. Read more
items.author: DMayer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy MEROKEETY Chunky Knit Cardigan
items.body: This MEROKEETY chunky knit sweater is the perfect addition to my fall wardrobe. The open-front design and oversized fit make it incredibly comfortable and easy to layer. I love the stylish lantern sleeves and how cozy the chunky knit feels. It's a versatile piece that's perfect for casual outings or just lounging at home. A definite must-have for the upcoming season! Read more
items.author: Cindy's Great Finds

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Cardigan
items.body: I really like the way this sweater is made, the material and the knit itself is pretty and just tight enough so the sweater doesn't have the see through holes some knits do. It's a really soft and comfy sweater. And warm! I've ordered two other sweaters from Merokeety because I really like the quality of their sweaters, but... they just don't fit my body right. It's not an easy fit, so no fault to the company, I'm 5'4", 38DD, 32"legs but short torso and 170 lbs with most of it sitting right around my middle, yes! Just like a tire, lol. This longer tunic length is just not good for me to start. Some that hit just below my bum or right in that area seems to look ok, not great but ok. This sweater is long on me, hits me about mid thigh, maybe 8 inches above the knee and the front just barely meets across the boobs. with that being said, I'm kept this one, lol. I ordered it in the Khaki, which is more brown in person, not light brown, medium brown? dark brown khaki? lol but I like it! Despite it not being the most flattering fit for me I would consider buying this cardigan again if the price was right. Read more
items.author: Kimberly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy Fall Sweater
items.body: Very soft, cozy, fall-feeling with this sweater. Love it with boots and jeans as well as a boho skirt. The color is rich and vibrant. I also purchased a deep wine color and a light violet. Great for mix and matching. Read more
items.author: Frequent Shopper Gal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT EVERYDAY SWEATER
items.body: Ordered the purple ðŸ’œ color which is a very pretty lighter violet hue. This sweater is just right for a cool autumn day. Not heavy but a lighter weight which is also nice for wearing inside as it is not heavy in weight. Being a knitter,I tend to be abit picky about any knit sweaters I buy. The price is very reasonable for this sweater; its well made and one that I will wear alot. I buy either an XL or XXL because I prefer my casual wear to be oversized and comfortable with a thinner sweater or blouse underneath. I am 5'2 and this sweater falls right above my kneecap. I would certainly consider handwashing this sweater or at the very least, using the delicate cycle. I plan on ordering another one in a different color to keep as an everyday indoor sweater this winter. Read more
items.author: ChloeM59

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater for any occasion
items.body: I love this sweater! Warm yet light. Washes well. The color goes well with almost anything. Fits perfectly. I plan to buy more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Cassandra C.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent sizing
items.body: I ordered this sweater in Orange in an XL and it fits great perfect. I then ordered this one (cream) and black both in XL and they both fit a size smaller! I will reorder in a size up, but itâ€™s unfortunate because I will have to pay shipping. The sweaters themselves are cozy and soft. I hope the size up fits better. Read more
items.author: Andrea

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Rust, Dark Grey, Black, Mocha, Sage, Dusty Blue, Lightpurple, Orange, Taro, Navy, Plum, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
